      • onCancel

        public void onCancel()
        On Cancel is called when the ActiveSlot display widget doesn't receive setWidget() call. SlottedActivity overrides the default behaviour by calling onStop(). This was done because it is believed that onCancel() is not normally implemented, and there is a potential bug if only onStop() is implemented.
        Specified by:
        onCancel in interface com.google.gwt.activity.shared.Activity
        Overrides:
        onCancel in class com.google.gwt.activity.shared.AbstractActivity
